title: Account Manager
copyHTML: As Account Manager you will be working across a portfolio of clients running the day-to-day of the accounts, working with many other departments across the agency, therefore you should have outstanding interpersonal and communication skills

title: Account Management Assistant
copyHTML: As Account Management Assistant you will be supporting our passionate and strong Account Management team with great confidence and enthusiasm

title: Graduate Digital Account Executive
copyHTML: As a Digital Account Executive at Dewynters you will have a key role within our Media team and will be responsible for the overall team administration through excellent organisational skills, attention to detail, timely and accurate campaign activation, reporting and reconciliation.
